content: Audit current SEO implementation and create enhancement plan
Create FAQ JSON-LD schema for all pages (5+ Q&A per page)
Create structured data utilities (LocalBusiness, Service, FAQPage)
Create EnhancedSEO component with FAQ integration
Update Home page with enhanced SEO and FAQs
Update Tanning, Drinks, Laundry, Contact pages with enhanced SEO
Enhance noscript content with AI-readable context
Create static HTML export for Fizze menu (52 drinks)
Add semantic HTML structure to all pages
